attributes.action: Make it TOUGHER for PEOPLE who AREN'T a UK citizen to find work within the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I come from the Construction Industry and it is clear to see that more and more underskilled, multi-nationals are taking up the few jobs there is to start with. I sit back and wonder when will my job be going to somebody who is more than willing to take my job and get paid less for it and where i will be going find another job. However this is not just the construction industry this is happening everywhere. I believe its about time somebody stood up and started to care about the british workers who have built this country.
